post.body: Went to a holiday dinner at WK the other week and it was simply amazing. Gotta try the shrimp and grits.
Would love it for Pikesville!
Why ORB, of course!
Chris always plays that song during kickboxing class. Not going to be able keep a straight face now. Thanks...
Me, too!
Usability is tops! http://tinyurl.com/6kj5q3
Pew reports the future of the internet:http://www.pewinternet.org/PPF/r/270/report_display.asp.
Never change the monitor resolution for an 82 y.o., even if he complains about the text being too small. Lesson learned the hard way.
If they're going to have a bring your kid to work day, I think it's only fair to have a bring your cat to work day.
To set the record straight, I took a personal day yesterday, I did not call out gay. Not there is anything wrong with that.
I like that I'm the technically-included one in my marriage.
Keeping my fingers crossed that the town hall meeting won't be too bad. I guess I could be a full time student if layoffs happen.
I was asked today to stop asking so many questions. Can I help that I'm curious?
No longer having heart palpitations about SharePoint. LIfe is good.
It's World AIDS Day. Check out what some techies are doing to make a difference: http://www.poptech.org/project_m/.
Why does the user need to know they are about to check out/in a file? Can't SharePoint hide this from the user?
The Intranet has launched with little fanfare. Would be nice if there were at least free doughnuts.
Reason #1 to end CAPTCHA: Your spam problem should not be your user's problem.
Looking forward to getting the straight dope from Nat'l Fed of the Blind on the Target law suit tonight.
Happy World Toilet Day! http://tinyurl.com/6x64cf
